name: Add new Kizeo Forms users to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new rows
description: Every time a new user is created in Kizeo Forms, Make will automatically add that person to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JahhhFV7GWqsU0UqhS1n3ggIIpnAoxWQd1EWWFZYBR4/edit?usp=sharing).
